ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( (ISPICKVAL( os_Closing_Status__c ,"In Transfer")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Pending Finance")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Rented")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Closed")) ), AND(ISCHANGED( os_Closing_Status__c )), OR ( $User.ProfileId="00eHp000002zNevIAE", $User.ProfileId="00eHp000002zNewIAE", $User.ProfileId="00eHp000002zNhVIAU" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Agents can only move from Open to Contract Approval, please click "Submit for Approval".
